normal.name: Day Brilliance Flash
normal.description: Deals fire damage equal to 120% of Attack to designated enemy.

auto.name: Divine Music Accompaniment
auto.description: Allied units gain 24% damage increase. [Type of Attack Called: Extra attacks] damage additionally increases by 36%.

ultimate.name: Day Brilliance Chanting
ultimate.description: Enters [Day Brilliance] state for 10 seconds. During transformation (State): Allied attack power increases by 120%, and Apollo launches an extra strike dealing 360 % ATK as fire damage when teammate use an ultimate, it will have 100% crit rate and going be counted as Extra damage type. (Rate limit: 1 Extra damage per ally every 5 s.)

passive.name: Brilliant Verdict
passive.description: Each auto skill use (Self): All allies gain 1 layer [Brilliant]. [Brilliant] Effect: +2.4% critical rate and +4.8% critical damage per layer. Maximum 10 layers (24% crit rate + 48% crit damage at full stacks). Extra Damage Synergy: Allied Extra Damage attacks grant additional [Brilliant] layers and Apollo gains 1 stack of Radiance System: gains [Radiance] Every 4 stacks +1 Energy .

teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
teamSkill.description: Battle start: Team damage increases by 10%. Every 500 attack power adds 5% team damage, maximum 6 times (30% max).

awakenings.effect: Allied characters dealing [Extra Attack] can additionally gain add [Brilliant] to Everyone. Each character can trigger once within 1 second maximum.
During [Day Brilliance] state, damage taken reduced by 50%.
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4.
During [Day Brilliance] state, allied characters gain 10% elemental resistance penetration.
During [Day Brilliance] state, Apollo's [Extra Attack] additionally gains 50% critical damage.

memoryCard.name: The Loneliest Moment
effects: Battle start: All allied characters' damage increases by 40%, Extra Attack damage additionally increases by 40%
When equipped character releases ultimate That cost higher then 8: All allied characters' energy efficiency increases by 100% for 10 seconds
